frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.text: Developing interactive and appealing user interfaces with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

backend.title: Backend
backend.text: Developing backend APIs and databases with Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL.

webapp.title: Web Applications
webapp.text: Creating custom and dynamic web applications with the latest technologies.

maintenance.title: Maintenance and Optimization
maintenance.text: Providing continuous maintenance and optimization services for websites.

silencio.title: Javascript Developer
silencio.description: Focused on backend development with Express and Sails.js, PostgreSQL databases, and frontend work with React.

beyond.title: Javascript FullStack Developer
beyond.description: Full-stack development building frontend with React and Next.js, backend APIs with Express, and MongoDB databases.

the-bolder.title: The Bolder
the-bolder.text: A brand-influencer matching app. This solution includes a user-friendly landing page, login functionality, and a seamless registration process.

the-bolder-dashboard.title: The Bolder Dashboard
the-bolder-dashboard.text: Dashboard that allows users to upload videos and display them on their sites.

physiocare-landing.title: Physiocare Landing Page
physiocare-landing.text: Landing pages dynamically generated with physiotherapy content managed through the Physiocare Admin interface, ensuring up-to-date and user-friendly experiences.

landing.contact-text: Tell me about your next project!
